Lists

Default styling

The default styling for ordered and unordered lists at the base font size

Remove default styling

Add the class .list--no-style to remove list bullets and spacing

  • In non lacus facilisis
  • Donec accumsan placerat metus
  • Etiam tincidunt magna

Tightens up spacing on the left

Add the class .list--spacing-left-sm to tighten up spacing on the left

Useful for scenarios with less space to use, such as tooltips or cards

  • In non lacus facilisis
  • Donec accumsan placerat metus
  • Etiam tincidunt magna
  1. In non lacus facilisis
  2. Donec accumsan placerat metus
  3. Etiam tincidunt magna

Inline

Add the class .list--inline

For a small gutter add the modifying class .list--inline--gutter-sm

  • Donec accumsan placerat metus
  • Etiam tincidunt magna

Featured with tick icons

Add the class .list--featured--ticks

Alternatively you can add your own icon path by using the mixin: @include featured-icon-list($icon-path);

Large featured with tick icons

Add the class .list--featured--ticks--lg

Alternatively you can add your own icon path by using the mixin: @include featured-icon-list-lg($icon-path);

List of images or icons

For a list of images or icons use the class .list--imgs

To make the images or icons inline add the modifying class .list--imgs--inline

To force the images too be the same height there are various modifying classes available .list--imgs--height-xs, .list--imgs--height-sm, .list--imgs--height-md, .list--imgs--height-lg, .list--imgs--height-xl

To change the gutter spacing there are various modifying classes available .list--imgs--inline-gutter-xxs, .list--imgs--inline-gutter-xs, .list--imgs--inline-gutter-sm, .list--imgs--inline-gutter-md, .list--imgs--inline-gutter-lg, .list--imgs--inline-gutter-xl

List of images = .list--imgs


List of images inline = .list--imgs, list--imgs--inline


List of images inline forced to be same height = .list--imgs, list--imgs--inline, list--imgs--height-md


List of icons inline with xs gutter = .list--imgs, list--imgs--inline, list--imgs--inline-gutter-xs
